name: Centric Consulting
description: Centric Consulting brand colors and logo

logo.svg_content: <svg viewBox="0 0 500 500" style="width: 100%; height: 100%;"><path d="M250 150 A100 100 0 0 0 150 250 A100 100 0 0 0 250 350" stroke="#FF6A00" stroke-width="30" fill="none"></path><path d="M250 180 A70 70 0 0 0 180 250 A70 70 0 0 0 250 320" stroke="#FF6A00" stroke-width="20" fill="none"></path><circle cx="250" cy="250" r="40" fill="#4B0082"></circle><line x1="290" y1="250" x2="350" y2="250" stroke="#4B0082" stroke-width="10"></line><circle cx="350" cy="250" r="15" fill="#4B0082"></circle><line x1="250" y1="290" x2="250" y2="350" stroke="#4B0082" stroke-width="10"></line><circle cx="250" cy="350" r="15" fill="#4B0082"></circle><line x1="210" y1="250" x2="150" y2="250" stroke="#4B0082" stroke-width="10"></line><circle cx="150" cy="250" r="15" fill="#4B0082"></circle><text x="250" y="420" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-weight="bold" font-size="60" fill="#4B0082" text-anchor="middle">AGENT C</text><text x="250" y="460" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-weight="bold" font-size="24" fill="#4B0082" text-anchor="middle">CENTRIC CONSULTING</text></svg>

typography.font_family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
